name: Wallet Up
author: Wallet Up

sections.description:
The Wallet Up “Virtual Wallet” has it all: Easily Integrate Zelle, Facebook pay, Cash App, Venmo, PayPal with a generated QR Code anywhere on your Online Web Site. Get started now!

What is Wallet Up?

Wallet UP or Wal’UP is a Trademark of Wallet UP LLC.

As a software, Internet company, it aims to develop products to allow users (mainly churches, charities, small businesses) to have multiple financial services in one. Think of it as a Wallet, where Each Debit/Credit Card is lodged, and used depending on the need or importance.

Stemming from this, we have observed that users are more and more using the Peer-to-Peer payment, such as zelle, cashapp, paypal me, venmo, Messenger etc…

But why carrying many apps when you can have them all at once?

Disclaimers

Logos, Brand names and Trademarks
All the logos used to display any of our products are owned by their authors. Such like Facebook, Venmo, Zelle, Cash App, Paypal etc. No Brands Names, Logos or Names (except those exclusively owned or related to Wallet Up LLC) are endorsing in any manner, shape or form our products.

Features

  • Accepts one-off donations or funds via Cash App
  • Accepts one-off donations or funds via Paypal.me
  • Accepts one-off donations or funds via Zelle
  • Accepts one-off donations or funds via Venmo
  • Accepts one-off donations or funds via Facebook Pay
sections.installation:
Minimum Requirements

  • WordPress 4.8 or greater
  • PHP version 5.6 or greater
  • MySQL version 5.0.15 or greater
  • cURL version 5.40 or higher
  • An SSL certificate

Automatic installation

Automatic installation is the easiest option as WordPress handles the file transfers itself and you don’t need to leave your web browser. To do an automatic install of “WalUp” or “Wallet Up”, log in to your WordPress dashboard, navigate to the Plugins menu and click “Add New”.

In the search field type “WalUp” or “Wallet Up” and click Search Plugins. Once you have found the plugin you can view details about it such as the point release, rating and description. Most importantly of course, you can install it by simply clicking “Install Now”.

Manual installation

The manual installation method involves downloading our wallet plugin and uploading it to your server via your favorite FTP application. The WordPress codex contains instructions on how to do this here.
sections.faq:
After activation go to Wallet Up settings to set up your accounts profiles. Visit https://walletup.app/wallet-up for a demo.

Find more on www.walletup.app

What do we support?

Now Wallet Up plugin supports Cash App, Venmo, PayPal, Zelle and Facebook Pay.
More are coming soon.
sections.changelog:
3.3.5 February 27, 2024

  • Fix setting display issue

3.3.4 February 16, 2024

New Features and Enhancements
* Improved Shortcode Usage: The shortcodes now have an enhanced feature that conditionally adds a space before the dollar sign only when an amount is entered. This prevents unnecessary spaces when no amount is specified.
* Bug Fixes: Various bug fixes have been implemented to ensure the plugin operates smoothly and without issues.
* Performance Improvements: The plugin has been optimized for better performance, ensuring that it loads quickly and runs efficiently.
* Security Updates: Security enhancements have been made to protect against potential vulnerabilities and ensure the safety of user data.

3.3.0 September 16, 2023

  • WordPress 6.3.1 compatibility
  • Security: Patch Update 2.5.12 for vulnerability in freemius

3.2.9 August 1, 2023

  • Security: Patch Update 2.5.10 for vulnerability in freemius

3.2.8 July 5, 2023

  • Security: Patch for vulnerability in freemius

3.2.7 May 5, 2023

  • Update: WordPress Latest Compatibility 6.2

3.2.6 March 24, 2023

  • Added: Users can now optionally opt in to provide feedback and help improve user experience and functionalities

3.2.5 March 3, 2023

  • Fixed: Update plugin in Admin Dashboard failure

3.2.4 March 3, 2023

  • Minor tweaks and fixes under the hood to improve your experience

3.2.3 November 10, 2022

  • Update: General Terms

3.2.2 November 02, 2022

  • Update: WordPress 6.1 compatibility update

3.2.1 October 01, 2022

  • Fixed: Assets Display Adjustment

3.2.0 July 02, 2022

  • New Feature Added: FaceBook Pay (now Meta Pay)
  • Security and Overall improvements

3.1.0 May 07, 2022

  • New Feature Added: Zelle
  • Security and Overall improvements

3.0.0 Feb 18, 2022

  • Initial Public Release

  • Supports:
    Cash App
    Venmo
    Paypal

sections.reviews:
Easy to use, Brilliant !

By nyshogun on June 24, 2022

I had the opportunity to have a client that needed a simple elegant solution to take payments for a class he was providing. This Plugin provided a great way to do that. It works so well. Hope you will be doing more in the future guys! High Fives!
